column1: Lou Malnati's Pizzeria////I only give this location 3 stars instead of 4 because I have been to the Gold Coast location which is just better. It's bigger so the line goes quicker. This location is just smaller
column2: and filled with out of towners who (rightfully) want some Chicago Pie. No foul on the tourists
column3: just makes it busier in a busy city.
